H0.text: Which Roman historian was the son-in-law of Agricola the Roman Governor of Britain. Pliny the Younger

H1.text: Which Roman historian was the son-in-law of Agricola the Roman Governor of Britain. Suetonius

H2.text: Which Roman historian was the son-in-law of Agricola the Roman Governor of Britain. Cassius Dio

H3.text: Which Roman historian was the son-in-law of Agricola the Roman Governor of Britain. Tactius

A4.text: Tacitus's marriage to the daughter of Gnaeus Julius Agricola implies that he was Agricola's son-in-law.
